thread.title: Manchester City's new travelling outfits turn heads on the way to Monaco - but who do they look like?
thread.title_full: Manchester City's new travelling outfits turn heads on the way to Monaco - but who do they look like?

author: Mark Jones
title: Manchester City's new travelling outfits turn heads on the way to Monaco - but who do they look like?
text:
Raheem Sterling, David Silva and Sergio Aguero (Photo: Cavendish Press) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
They clearly take what they wear seriously at Manchester City. 
If it isn't Pep Guardiola looking cool on the sidelines during a Champions League game , it is City players donning t-shirts in support for stricken team-mate, but this time they may have taken things a little too far. 
Because when the club's players set off for the second leg of their Champions League last-16 tie against Monaco on Tuesday, they did so looking pretty dapper. At least that's one word for it. 
Because as the image from Leroy Sane's Instagram account above shows, they also looked like a lot of other things too. 
These lot, for starters. "No, Mr full back. I expect you to die!" (Photo: Cavendish Press) A folk singing group Jesus Navas there, just busy remembering his lines (Photo: Cavendish Press) An act that gets to the final four on The X Factor, but no further Maybe an omen for their Champions League hopes? (Photo: Cavendish Press) Milk Tray men All because the lady loves... a quarter-final place (Photo: Cavendish Press) Rejected members of One Direction "Sorry Leroy, but you won't be making it through" (Photo: Cavendish Press) Steve Jobs Looks a bit like Pep, didn't he? Dapper Laughs on Newsnight Okay, too far (Photo: BBC Newsnight) poll loading Who will reach the last eight? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
